mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_plan ( id , place_num , place_name , xlab , ylab , place_address , start_date , end_date , day_count , place_load_address , plan_hp , plan_title) VALUES ( #{id} , place_num_seq.nextval , #{placeName} , #{xlab}, #{ylab}, #{placeAddress}, #{startDate} , #{endDate}, #{dayCount}, #{placeLoadAddress}, #{planHp} , #{planTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT id , place_name , xlab , ylab , place_address , start_date , end_date , day_count , place_load_address , plan_hp , plan_title FROM user_plan WHERE id = #{id} AND plan_title = #{title} AND delete_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY day_count, place_num
SELECT place_name, place_load_address, count(place_name) as count FROM user_plan group by place_name, place_load_address order by count (place_name) DESC
